C++.zh_des: 🤖是免费的、开源的OpenAI替代方案。自主式、社区驱动型和本地优先。替代在消费级硬件上运行的OpenAI。不需要图形处理器。运行GGUF、变压器、扩散器和更多模型架构。它允许生成文本、音频、视频、图像。还具有语音克隆功能。
C++.name: mudler /LocalAI
C++.description: 🤖 The free, Open Source OpenAI alternative. Self-hosted, community-driven and local-first. Drop-in replacement for OpenAI running on consumer-grade hardware. No GPU required. Runs gguf, transformers, diffusers and many more models architectures. It allows to generate Text, Audio, Video, Images. Also with voice cloning capabilities.

It uses crowd-sourced OpenStreetMap data and is developed with love by MapsWithMe (MapsMe) founders and our community. No ads, no tracking, no data collection, no crapware. Please donate to support the development!

C++.description: Stellarium is a free GPL software which renders realistic skies in real time with OpenGL. It is available for Linux/Unix, Windows and macOS. With Stellarium, you really see what you can see with your eyes, binoculars or a small telescope.

C++.zh_des: TensorRT-LLM为用户提供了易于使用的PythonAPI来定义大型语言模型(LLM)并构建TensorRT引擎，其中包含最先进的优化以在NVIDIA图形处理器上高效地执行推理。TensorRT-LLM还包含用于创建执行这些TensorRT引擎的Python和C++运行时的组件。
C++.name: NVIDIA /TensorRT-LLM
C++.description: TensorRT-LLM provides users with an easy-to-use Python API to define Large Language Models (LLMs) and build TensorRT engines that contain state-of-the-art optimizations to perform inference efficiently on NVIDIA GPUs. TensorRT-LLM also contains components to create Python and C++ runtimes that execute those TensorRT engines.

C++.zh_des: RT64是一种N64图形渲染器，用于在模拟器和本机端口中使用增强功能。

C++.zh_des: Suyu是世界上最流行的、开源的任天堂Switch模拟器yuzu的延续。它是用C++编写的，考虑到了可移植性，我们正在积极地为Windows、Linux和Android构建。
C++.name: suyu-emu /suyu
C++.description: suyu is the continuation of the world's most popular, open-source, Nintendo Switch emulator, yuzu. It is written in C++ with portability in mind, and we're actively working on builds for Windows, Linux and Android.
